item.title: Rubbish not collect in days, 6th August
item.description:
Directly outside the nature garden south Council employees have been emptying the bin leaving the full bags tied at the side of the street but these have not been collected for over a week so have become ripped from animals looking for food and there are rats and mice coming and going

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bantry Street, Camberwell, London

item.title: Increasing crime and anti social behaviour, 6th August
item.description:
Winchmore Hill has become unsafe due to the councilâ€™s non management of the borough and mismanagement in planning, licensing, multi occupancy. Most of green lanes is now populated by male multi occupants in non licensed multi occupancies The men speed up and down the road, populate Artisimo and Coffee 355 en masse and intimidate women walking past. The Parker behind Sainsburyâ€™s is an open drug dealing joint in broad daylight and people come and go retrieving drugs from the same group of men who collect their coffee from Artisimo each time. Then dump their cups across the park. The council have managed to turn Winchmore Hill into a place of non safety for women in just a few short years.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haslemere Road, Palmers Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large 15inch wide and 5 inches Deep Pothole in Middle of Road, 6th August
